title: Insta360 One RS Review: A modular action camera that can capture literally everything
content:
When you think of action cameras — those small, cube-shaped wide-angle cameras that extreme sports enthusiasts attach on top of their helmets, shoulder, backpacks, and more — the first brand that comes to mind is probably GoPro. But in recent years, GoPro has seen major competition from Insta360, the Chinese upstart brand best known for

The post Insta360 One RS Review: A modular action camera that can capture literally everything appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Insta360 One RS is a modular camera that can transform from a 4K action cam to a 360 degree camera, thanks to its modular approach.
